snippet.title: Nuclear Gladiators 3000 - New action roguelike horde survivor indie game - Demo trailer
snippet.description:
Enjoy the presentation trailer for our new upcoming public demo!

Welcome to Nuclear Gladiators 3000, a retro-futuristic TV show where the prize is your life. This game is our take on the horde survivor roguelike genre, or reverse bullet-hell if you prefer.

Throw in a cup of 80's and 90's action movies, a tablespoon of Smash TV and a pinch of The Hunger Games. Mix it with a lot of explosions and there you have it!

Become a blockbuster star in Nuclear Gladiators 3000! The only horde survivor Rambo would play!

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2488430/Nuclear_Gladiators_3000
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/rY7qNQQeVF
Follow us on Twitter (X): https://x.com/TurboNapalm
